text: Donald Blessing Rice (born June 4, 1939) is an American businessman and senior government official. He has been president and chief executive officer of several large companies including RAND Corporation. Rice also served as the seventeenth Secretary of the Air Force, 1989â€“93. ==Other websites== *U.S. Air Force *RAND Corporation *Biography of Donald Rice from the Institute for Operations Research and the Management Sciences Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from California Category:United States Secretaries of the Air Force Category:People from Santa Monica, California Category:Businesspeople from Maryland
title: Donald Rice
